channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- OMIMSSC (OpenManage Integration for Microsoft System Center)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- OMIMSSC (OpenManage Integration for Microsoft System Center)

item.title: CVE-2020-5373|2024-09-17T03:02:58.871Z -- dell -- omimssc%20%28openmanage%20integration%20for%20microsoft%20system%20center%29
item.description: Dell EMC OpenManage Integration for Microsoft System Center (OMIMSSC) for SCCM and SCVMM versions prior to 7.2.1 contain an improper authentication vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker may potentially exploit this vulnerability to retrieve the system inventory data of the managed device.
